com.facebook.buck.apple.simulator

Class AppleSimulatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.apple.simulator.AppleSimulatorController

  • public class AppleSimulatorController
extends Object
    Utility class to manage starting the iOS simulator as well as installing and running applications inside it.

    • Method Detail

      • startSimulator

        public Optional<Long> startSimulator(String simulatorUdid,
                                     long timeoutMillis)
                              throws IOException,
                                     InterruptedException
        Starts up the iOS simulator, blocking the calling thread until the simulator boots or timeoutMillis passes, whichever happens first.

        Call canStartSimulator(String) before invoking this method to ensure the simulator can be started.

        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds waited if the simulator booted successfully, Optional.empty() otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • canStartSimulator

        public boolean canStartSimulator(String simulatorUdid)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedException
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • waitForSimulatorsToShutdown

        public Optional<Long> waitForSimulatorsToShutdown(long timeoutMillis)
                                           throws IOException,
                                                  InterruptedException
        Waits up to timeoutMillis for all simulators to shut down.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds waited if all simulators have shut down, Optional.empty() otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • installBundleInSimulator

        public boolean installBundleInSimulator(String simulatorUdid,
                                        Path bundlePath)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        InterruptedException
        Installs a bundle in a previously-started simulator.
        Returns:
        true if the bundle was installed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • launchInstalledBundleInSimulator

        public Optional<Long> launchInstalledBundleInSimulator(String simulatorUdid,
                                                       String bundleID,
                                                       AppleSimulatorController.LaunchBehavior launchBehavior,
                                                       List<String> args)
                                                throws IOException,
                                                       InterruptedException
        Launches a previously-installed bundle in a started simulator.
        Returns:
        the process ID of the newly-launched process if successful, an absent value otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
